_header: Apply to the best gifts given to thee
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 168.
_description: Leconfield proverbs: ‘The counsell of Aristotell’ — thirty-four couplets

BLRoy18Dii.First Lines: APPly to the best gyftis geuen to the.And vj speciall doctryne thow shalt lerne of me.…
BLRoy18Dii.Last Lines: …After this mater yf thou thy lyf spende.Thy name shalbe Inmortall vnto the worldes ende.
BLRoy18Dii.Attributed Title:
The counsell of Aristotell whiche he gaue to Alexander kinge of macedony
                    in the syde of the garet of the gardynge in lekyngfelde (f.
                    205v, in rubric)
